text: Not to be confused with Ai Lào, an archaic former name for the country of Laos and geographically near the neighboring Ailao Mountains in Yunnan, China. The Ailao Mountains (; Hani: Hhaqlol haolgaoq) are located in Yunnan, China. The Ailao Mountain Nature Reserve is located in the Ailao Mountains, is about 503.60 square kilometres and was created in 1986. title: Ailao Mountains
